snippet: Whether Facebook’s users will continue to divulge even more private details will determine whether so-called social search is the next step in how we navigate the online world.
abstract: Facebook will introduce social search tool to mine personal information of its users, even as people become more cautious about sharing online; success of project, aimed directly at archrival Google, could determine whether Facebook has found a viable business model.

byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA and CLAIRE CAIN MILLER

lead_paragraph: Whether Facebook’s users will continue to divulge even more private details will determine whether so-called social search is the next step in how we navigate the online world.

headline.seo: With Graph Search, Facebook Bets on More Sharing
headline.main: Search Option From Facebook Is a Privacy Test
headline.print_headline: Search Option From Facebook Is Privacy Test
